attributes.action: Stop the Media Scaremongering and causing Panic buying, fine them.
attributes.additional_details: You need to stop the MSM saing Could,If and maybe only to report on facts
attributes.background: It is causing the country Millions with people panic buying and sensible people loosing work days.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
